DOC.brief_summary: Tomosynthesis new digital mammographic tool perform time routine screening mammography . It create CT-like slice breast , minimize tissue overlap . Tomosynthesis potential improve screen mammography outcome increase cancer detection rate , decrease false negative rate false positive rate . This trial help determine tomosynthesis useful screen setting .
DOC.detailed_description: We evaluate effect tomosynthesis mammography outcome screen set . We collect data interpretation time , recall rate , cancer detection rate , interval cancer rate dense breast ( ≥ 50 % glandular density ) . If interpretation time le 4X routine read , recall rate drop < 30 % initial value , conduct study large number well evaluate cancer detection rate interval cancer rate .
DOC.criteria: Females 4069 year age attend Screen Test Kingsway refer screen mammogram define Canadian Cancer Society guideline . Prior mammogram report indicate ≥ 25 % breast density . Prior mammogram report indicate < 25 % breast density . Breast implant Pregnancy
